languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс берет вас за руки.{/n} "Я не знал, что такое счастье, пока не обнял тебя в первый раз. Любой из нас может умереть в любой момент... и я не хочу провести время до этого момента в разлуке с тобой. Я оставляю Инквизицию. Я присягаю на вечную верность тебе, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс берет вас за руки.{/n} "Я не знал, что такое счастье, пока не обнял тебя в первый раз. Любой из нас может умереть в любой момент... и я не хочу провести время до этого момента в разлуке с тобой. Я оставляю Инквизицию. Я присягаю на вечную верность тебе, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс берет вас за руки.{/n} "Я не знал, что такое счастье, пока не обнял тебя в первый раз. Любой из нас может умереть в любой момент... и я не хочу провести время до этого момента в разлуке с тобой. Я оставляю Инквизицию. Я присягаю на вечную верность тебе, {name}".

Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."

{n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."

languages.text: {n}海因里希紧紧地握住了你的手。{/n}“我之前一直都不知道什么叫做幸福，直到我第一次拥抱你，我才明白。你我二人随时都可能会死……在那之前，我希望能把所有时间都陪着你。我打算离开审判庭了。我发誓，我将永远效忠于你，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希紧紧地握住了你的手。{/n}“我之前一直都不知道什么叫做幸福，直到我第一次拥抱你，我才明白。你我二人随时都可能会死……在那之前，我希望能把所有时间都陪着你。我打算离开审判庭了。我发誓，我将永远效忠于你，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sujeta tus manos con las suyas.{/n} «No sabía qué era la felicidad hasta que la abracé por primera vez. Cualquiera de los dos podría morir en cualquier momento... y no quiero pasar ni un segundo del tiempo que nos queda lejos de usted. Voy a abandonar la Inquisición. Le juro lealtad eterna, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sujeta tus manos con las suyas.{/n} «No sabía qué era la felicidad hasta que la abracé por primera vez. Cualquiera de los dos podría morir en cualquier momento... y no quiero pasar ni un segundo del tiempo que nos queda lejos de usted. Voy a abandonar la Inquisición. Le juro lealtad eterna, {name}».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたの手を握る。{/n}「初めてあなたを抱きしめるまで、幸せが何なのかわからなかった。俺たちのどちらかがいつ死んでもおかしくない…だが、その瞬間までの時間を、あなたと離れて過ごしたくない。俺は異端審問庁を辞そう。そして、あなたに永遠の忠誠を誓おう、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたの手を握る。{/n}「初めてあなたを抱きしめるまで、幸せが何なのかわからなかった。俺たちのどちらかがいつ死んでもおかしくない…だが、その瞬間までの時間を、あなたと離れて過ごしたくない。俺は異端審問庁を辞そう。そして、あなたに永遠の忠誠を誓おう、{name}」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix prend vos mains dans les siennes.{/n} « Quand je vous ai {mf|tenu|tenue} contre moi pour la première fois, j'ai enfin compris ce qu'était le bonheur. Nous pourrions mourir à tout instant... et je veux passer tout le temps qu'il nous reste à vos côtés. Je quitte les rangs de l'Inquisition. Je vous jure une fidélité éternelle, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix prend vos mains dans les siennes.{/n} « Quand je vous ai {mf|tenu|tenue} contre moi pour la première fois, j'ai enfin compris ce qu'était le bonheur. Nous pourrions mourir à tout instant... et je veux passer tout le temps qu'il nous reste à vos côtés. Je quitte les rangs de l'Inquisition. Je vous jure une fidélité éternelle, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix legt deine Hände in seine.{/n} "Ich wusste nicht, was Glück bedeutet, bis ich Euch zum ersten Mal im Arm hielt. Wir könnten jeden Augenblick sterben ... und bis dahin möchte ich meine Zeit mit Euch verbringen. Ich werde die Inquisition hinter mir lassen. Und Euch meine ewige Treue schwören, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."

Wir könnten jeden Augenblick sterben ... und bis dahin möchte ich meine Zeit mit Euch verbringen. Ich werde die Inquisition hinter mir lassen. Und Euch meine ewige Treue schwören, {name}."

Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, ."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ellerini avuçlarına alıyor.{/n} "Seni ilk defa kollarımın arasında tutana dek mutluluk nedir bilmezdim. İkimiz de her an ölümle yüzleşebiliriz ve... O an gelene dek tek bir saniyemi bile senden ayrı geçirmek istemiyorum. Engizisyon'dan ayrılıyorum. Ebediyen sana sadık kalacağıma yemin ederim {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes your hands in his.{/n} "I did not know what happiness was until I held you for the first time. Either of us could die at any moment... and I don't want to spend any of the time before that moment apart from you. I'm leaving the Inquisition. I swear my eternal loyalty to you, {name}."
